QuestData.Title: Trust Fall
QuestData.Description:
Let us ponder the meaning of the Archivist's last words: "Victory only belongs to those brave enough to fall."
Hmm. It could be reference to the Volume of Victory. That is the most well-known of all the writings said to be kept in this tower.
That book is priceless, $n. I mean that almost literally. We must do whatever is necessary to find it!
But, uh... What do you suppose "brave enough to fall" refers to?
QuestData.RewardText:
This is it... the Volume of Victory! The single most important compendium of Maldraxxus military history ever assembled.
It must be mine! Uh, ours. I mean ours!
